textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Since its conception in 2005, California-based NSF clothing has caught the eye of the discerning fashion collective. Each piece of NSF apparel is marked by the label's clean aesthetic and boyish charm, blending a sense of quiet confidence with contemporary attitude in every design. With a mission to reinvent casual luxury in knits and denim, NSF apparel continues to be recognized for its relaxed, modern sensibility--evidence that the brand is on its way to becoming an American classic. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
